20110127015904.000|20110127015907.000|CC1|SHE FELT A HARD SHOVE FROM      
20110127015907.000|20110127015908.000|CC1|BEHIND.

20110127015911.000|20110127015915.000|CC1|YOURSELF, IS BY TAKING          
20110127015915.000|20110127015917.000|CC1|ACTIONS THAT FIGHT BACK.

20110127015926.000|20110127015927.000|CC1|INITIAL SHOVE WAS FAST.         
20110127015927.000|20110127015928.000|CC1|>> Reporter: YELLOW TAPE        
20110127015928.000|20110127015931.000|CC1|MARKS THE SPOT ALONG ALLYSSA    
20110127015931.000|20110127015933.000|CC1|PARKWAY IN LAGUNA HILLS         
20110127015933.000|20110127015934.000|CC1|WHERE A MAN TRIED TO

20110127015935.000|20110127015936.000|CC1|KNOCKING HER INTO THE
